meanings.definition: A person or company that sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The vendors at the market had fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: Local vendors set up stalls to sell handmade crafts.
meanings.sent3: The vendors at the fair were so busy, they didn't notice the clown sneaking by.
meanings.sent4: The vendors in the bustling city were like colorful birds in a crowded aviary.
meanings.sent5: Supporting local vendors helps the community thrive.

meanings.sent1: She vendors handmade jewelry at the craft fair every weekend.
meanings.sent2: They vendors their products online to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: He vendors his artwork with a smile and a friendly greeting.
meanings.sent4: The street performer vendors his music to passersby with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: In order to succeed, you must vendors your skills effectively.
